application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Front Garden (Left Boundary) T1: Maple tree - Fell to ground level, grind out stump Height 6m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 0m & spread to 0mtrees in declineT2: Gleditsia tree - Thin canopy by 5%, remove major deadwood Height 6m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 6m & spread to 4m(Right Boundary)T3: Apple tree - Fell to ground level, grind out stump Height 3m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 0m & spread to 0mtrees in declineT4: Beech tree - Thin canopy by 10%, remove major deadwoodHeight 8m & spread 5m. Reduce height to 8m & spread to 5mT5: Lilac tree - Remove from middle of rhododendron (stump to remain) Height 2m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 0m & spread to 0mBack Garden (Back Boundary)T6: Walnut tree - Reduce height by 3m, reduce sides by 3m to balance canopy and maintain an even shape, lift canopy by 3m from ground level to allow more light, remove major deadwood Height 10m & spread 8m. Reduce height to 7m & spread to 6.0mBack Garden (Right Boundary)T7: Elaeagnus shrub - Reduce height to stand at 1m tallHeight 4m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 1m & spread to 2.5mReason for work General tree maintenance More light Clearance from out building
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T1
Works agreed to tree labelled T2
Works agreed to tree labelled T6

Works agreed to tree labelled T5
